    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Launches method: implement or implementJar (that you need). Help to process Implement arguments
      Parameters:
      args - "interface_name" or "-jar interface_name jarFile.jar"

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Implement interface (token) to class. Create file with token + "Impl" name (Name -> NameImpl).
      Specified by:
      implement in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler
      Parameters:
      token - instances of interface that you want to implement
      root - path to root directory
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if you write token that not a public or protected interface, or if you write incorrect path. Also, if IOException occurs.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Implement interface (token) to jar. New jar file will be located in jarFile.
      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - instances of interface that you want to implement
      jarFile - path to jar file you must create
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if error occurs while implement(Class, Path). Also, if IOException occurs.

    • compile

      private static void compile(Class<?> token, Path root) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Compiles a token
      Parameters:
      token - instances of interface that you want to implement
      root - path to root directory
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if can't find java compiler or can't compile token

    • createJar

      private static void createJar(Path root, Path classPath, Path jarFile) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Creates a jar file for this class file
      Parameters:
      root - path to root directory
      classPath - path to class file
      jarFile - path to jar file
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if some IOException occurs

    • writeMany

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - if error occurs while writing

    • writeMethod

      private void writeMethod(Method method) throws IOException
      Writes the method passed as an argument to the writer
      Parameters:
      method - method that you need to write to the writer
      Throws:
      IOException - if error occurs while writing

    • getNullElem

      private static String getNullElem(Method method)
      Return zero element for method. Return empty instance of String if method return type is "void". Return instance of String equals "false" if method return type is "boolean". Return instance of String equals "0" if method return type is primitive. Else return instance of String equals "null".
      Parameters:
      method - method to get a zero element
      Returns:
      zero element for method

    • getFullPath

      private static Path getFullPath(Path root, Class<?> token)
      Give path to interface implementation file (with Impl in name).
      Parameters:
      root - path to root directory
      token - instances of interface that you want to implement
      Returns:
      path to implementation of interface
